濖字的基本解释

濖
shù
沟。
用同“瀦”，水积留。

濖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shù］
［《集韻》常恕切，去御，禪。］
潴，水停积。参见“濖漲”。

濖字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　濖； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页655第24
【玉篇】常預切【集韻】常恕切，?音署。溝也。　又【水經注】博水東逕陽城縣，散爲澤渚，渚水濖漲方數里。

濖字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
濖字的起名意思

暂无。

Niu
Basic explanation of words
Niu
shù
ditch.
Use the same as "retention", water will stay.
Niu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shù］
["Ji Yun" often cut, go to imperial, Zen. ]
Stagnation, water stops accumulating. See "Yuanzhang".
Niu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 1] [Shui Character Department] 　濖; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 655 24
[Jade articles] Chang pre-cut [Ji Yun] Chang Shu cut,? Sound Department. Ditch too.　[Shui Jing Zhu] Boshui East Jingyangcheng County, scattered into Zezhu, Zhushui Nao increased a few miles.
